commit.message:
DjangoCMS CKEditor plugin creates incorrect urls when static files are hosted on a CDN (#509)

* Made plugin work with CDNs. urljoin would create incorrect urls if static files were offloaded to a CDN

* Added inline comments to better explain what was done

DjangoCMS CKEditor plugin creates incorrect urls when static files are hosted on a CDN (#509)

* Added inline comments to better explain what was done

commit.message:
Prevent clean_html from sanitizing when TEXT_HTML_SANITIZE is False (#541)

* Prove clean_html ignores TEXT_HTML_SANITIZE

* Change clean_html to only sanitize when allowed

The TEXT_HTML_SANITIZER setting should disable all sanitization, but in
PR #482 the clean_html function started using TextSanitizer without
first checking the settings.

Because models.AbstractText.save() calls clean_html, no plugin can be
saved without its HTML being sanitized.

This commit wraps the changes from #482 in a flag check, otherwise uses
does not sanitize before serializing, as it did before that PR.

* Fix flake8

verification.payload:
tree 259e9cb6e368ebd0cc868ccfe8cfb34b52416899
parent ed0bc4ce8b62dcf26327a45609048aa05c003bea
author Richard Terry <git@radiac.net> 1596549974 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1596549974 +0200

Prevent clean_html from sanitizing when TEXT_HTML_SANITIZE is False (#541)

* Prove clean_html ignores TEXT_HTML_SANITIZE

* Change clean_html to only sanitize when allowed

The TEXT_HTML_SANITIZER setting should disable all sanitization, but in
PR #482 the clean_html function started using TextSanitizer without
first checking the settings.

Because models.AbstractText.save() calls clean_html, no plugin can be
saved without its HTML being sanitized.

This commit wraps the changes from #482 in a flag check, otherwise uses
does not sanitize before serializing, as it did before that PR.

* Fix flake8

commit.message:
Upgrade to CKEditor 4.14.0 (fix XSS vulnerability) (#534)

* adopt syntax to that one from CKeditor4 for better diff

* reset whitespace in comments for better patch creation

* for JavaScript force indent style to tabs

* backport of adopted resize and dialog plugin from CKEditor 4.5.4

* how to upgrade

* Rebundle ckeditor for version 4.14.0

* move instruction for upgrading

* add section for md files

* replace png plugin icon with svg

* also include vendor files

* document changes

tree eea37409dc0b04aa5106d2f2529d1b0ef03b4201

author Jacob Rief <jacob.rief@gmail.com> 1596549916 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1596549916 +0200

Upgrade to CKEditor 4.14.0 (fix XSS vulnerability) (#534)

* adopt syntax to that one from CKeditor4 for better diff

* reset whitespace in comments for better patch creation

* for JavaScript force indent style to tabs

* backport of adopted resize and dialog plugin from CKEditor 4.5.4

* how to upgrade

* Rebundle ckeditor for version 4.14.0

* move instruction for upgrading

* add section for md files

* replace png plugin icon with svg

* also include vendor files

* document changes

commit.message:
Remove deprecated argument (#510)

* Remove deprecated argument

According to the Django release notes, the `context` argument has been deprecated in Django-2.0 and has been removed in Django-3.0.
https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.0/releases/2.0/#features-deprecated-in-2-0

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1590012398 +0200

According to the Django release notes, the `context` argument has been deprecated in Django-2.0 and has been removed in Django-3.0.
